alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Redland, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Country Walk, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, The Hammocks, Richmond West, Inlikita and Kendall West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
